canonical_answers.q: How can I get an appointment?
canonical_answers.a: Since we serve by appointment only. You can start immediately at the service portal at locrepair.com.

Interlock maintenance starts at $95 for 2–3 turns, and $135 for 4–6 turns. A consultation and deposit is required and a quote can be started right now at locrepair.com. Make sure you visit the Service Portal to begin immediately.

canonical_answers.q: How can I get bald coverage?
canonical_answers.a: If you live in the Metro Detroit area, you are eligible for a consultation.  Please text COVERAGE to 313-488-4898 now to get started.

overrides.reply: We’re appointment-only, but I can text you the booking link right now.
